The United Nations says Yemeni troops killed more than 50 anti - government protesters in Taiz.
A cease-fire between government forces and opposition tribesmen in the country breaks down.
Tribesmen set the Sanaa Yemeni Airways building ablaze.
Government forces clash with opposition fighters trying to link up with allies in the capital, Sanaa.
President Ali Abdullah Saleh becomes wounded after attacks on his compound.
Forces of President Saleh respond by shelling the homes of anti - government leaders and targeting protesters.
